ygData.subject: DOH!..the lifespan of EQ(waay OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant announced the Starwars game....expected to release 2001 www.verant.com well, that probably means that there won t be too many developers working on EQ
ygData.messageBody:
Verant announced the Starwars game....expected to release 2001

www.verant.com

well, that probably means that there won't be too many developers working on EQ
improvements, and it probably also gives you a good idea of the "expected
lifespan" of EQ. But, then again...i may be having "Black Helicopter" issues :)

Kaleid
23rd song half elf bard
Glyphed Aegiss
27th level Dark elf Magician
<wave of the dark tide>
Prexus
future lvl 1 Gammorean Warrior <grin>

=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
